description:
As a comprehensive tournament poker testing system
  I want to execute a complete 3-round 5-player Texas Hold'em tournament with player elimination
  So that I can validate all poker mechanics, tournament progression, and elimination logic with enhanced formatting

steps.name: the database is reset to a clean state
the User table is seeded with test players
I initialize tournament state tracking for 5 players:
I have exactly 5 players ready for tournament play
exactly 5 players join the tournament table with starting positions:
all players should be seated correctly with position labels
I verify exactly 5 players are present at the tournament table
the page should be fully loaded for all players
I capture screenshot "tournament_setup_5players" showing all players with positions
I start tournament round 1 with blinds $5/$10
I manually start the game for table 1
the game starts with tournament round 1 blinds structure:
I should see game history entry "GH-1"
I should see game history entry "GH-2"
the pot should be $15 with enhanced display "[Pot: $15]"
I capture screenshot "R1_game_setup_blinds_5_10" showing round 1 setup
hole cards are dealt for tournament round 1:
I capture screenshot "R1_preflop_hole_cards_dealt" for all 5 players
each player should see their own hole cards with position labels
I verify exactly 5 players are present at the tournament table
the pre-flop betting round begins with UTG action
I capture screenshot "R1_preflop_utg_to_act" showing Player3 to act
Player3 (UTG) goes all-in with weak hand 7♣2♠ as elimination bluff
I should see enhanced game history: "Player3 (UTG) goes all-in $100 — Stack: $100 → $0"
I should see game history entry "GH-3"
I capture screenshot "R1_preflop_utg_allin_bluff" showing Player3 all-in
the pot should be $115
Player4 (CO) calls all-in with pocket 10s
I should see enhanced game history: "Player4 (CO) calls $100 — Stack: $100 → $0"
I should see game history entry "GH-4"
I capture screenshot "R1_preflop_co_call_allin" showing Player4 call
the pot should be $215
Player5 (BTN) folds A♥Q♦ to all-in
I should see game history entry "GH-5"
Player1 (SB) folds A♠K♠ to all-in
I should see game history entry "GH-6"
Player2 (BB) folds Q♥J♥ to all-in
I should see game history entry "GH-7"
I capture screenshot "R1_preflop_all_fold_to_allin" showing all folds complete
the flop is dealt: A♣, 8♠, 5♥
I should see game history entry "GH-8"
I capture screenshot "R1_flop_community_cards_revealed" showing flop cards
the turn is dealt: K♦
I should see game history entry "GH-9"
I capture screenshot "R1_turn_fourth_card_revealed" showing turn card
the river is dealt: 9♣
I should see game history entry "GH-10"
I capture screenshot "R1_river_final_board_complete" showing river card
the showdown begins for round 1
Player4 should win with "pair of tens"
I should see winner popup for "Player4"
winner popup should disappear after 3 seconds
I should see game history entry "GH-11"
I should see game history entry "GH-13" showing "Player4" won "$200"
Player3 should lose with "seven high"
Player3 should be eliminated from the tournament
I should see game history entry "GH-12"
I update tournament state: Player3 eliminated, 4 players remain
I capture screenshot "R1_river_player3_eliminated" showing elimination
tournament round 1 should be complete with results:
I verify exactly 4 players remain active in tournament
Player "Player3" should be eliminated with 0 chips
Player "Player4" chips should be updated to 215
Player "Player1" chips should be updated to 95
Player "Player2" chips should be updated to 90
Player "Player5" chips should be updated to 100
Player "Player4" should have 215 chips in the UI
Player "Player1" should have 95 chips in the UI
Player "Player2" should have 90 chips in the UI
Player "Player5" should have 100 chips in the UI
I capture screenshot "R1_river_round1_complete" showing final tournament state
I start tournament round 2 with blinds $10/$20
I manually start the game for table 1 round 2
the game starts with tournament round 2 blinds structure:
I should see game history entry "GH-14"
I should see game history entry "GH-17"
the pot should be $30 with enhanced display "[Pot: $30]"
I capture screenshot "R2_setup_blinds_10_20" showing round 2 setup
hole cards are dealt for tournament round 2:
I capture screenshot "R2_preflop_hole_cards_dealt" for remaining 4 players
I verify exactly 4 players are present at the tournament table
the pre-flop betting round begins with UTG action (4-handed)
Player1 (UTG) goes all-in with remaining $95 (short stack)
I should see enhanced game history: "Player1 (UTG) goes all-in $95 — Stack: $95 → $0"
I should see game history entry "GH-17"
I capture screenshot "R2_preflop_player1_allin_push" showing Player1 short stack push
the pot should be $125
Player2 (SB) calls $85 more with A♥Q♠ in tournament round 2
I should see enhanced game history: "Player2 (SB) calls $85 — Stack: $90 → $5"
I should see game history entry "GH-17"
I capture screenshot "R2_preflop_player2_call" showing call action
the pot should be $210
Player4 (BB) folds J♦J♠ to all-in
Player5 (BTN) folds 8♣8♥ to all-in
I capture screenshot "R2_preflop_others_fold_complete" showing all folds complete
the flop is dealt: A♦, Q♣, 3♠
I capture screenshot "R2_flop_aq3_board" showing flop cards
the turn is dealt: 7♥
I capture screenshot "R2_turn_seven_added" showing turn card
the river is dealt: 2♦
I capture screenshot "R2_river_deuce_completes_board" showing river card
the showdown begins for round 2
Player2 should win with "two pair, aces and queens" in tournament
I should see winner popup for "Player2"
winner popup should disappear after 3 seconds
I should see game history entry "GH-18" showing "Player2" won "$150"
Player1 should lose with "king high"
Player1 should be eliminated from the tournament
I should see game history entry "GH-17"
I update tournament state: Player1 eliminated, 3 players remain
I capture screenshot "R2_river_player1_eliminated" showing elimination
tournament round 2 should be complete with results:
I verify exactly 3 players remain active in tournament
Player "Player1" should be eliminated with 0 chips
Player "Player2" chips should be updated to 215
Player "Player4" chips should be updated to 195
Player "Player5" chips should be updated to 100
Player "Player2" should have 215 chips in the UI
Player "Player4" should have 195 chips in the UI
Player "Player5" should have 100 chips in the UI
I capture screenshot "R2_river_complete" showing final state
I start tournament round 3 with blinds $20/$40
I manually start the game for table 1 round 3
the game starts with tournament round 3 blinds structure:
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
I should see game history entry "GH-17"
the pot should be $60 with enhanced display "[Pot: $60]"
I capture screenshot "R3_final_setup" showing final 3 players
hole cards are dealt for tournament round 3 (championship):
I capture screenshot "R3_preflop_final_hole_cards" for final 3 players
I verify exactly 3 players are present at the tournament table
the pre-flop betting round begins with BTN action (3-handed)
Player2 (BTN) raises to $120 with pocket aces
I should see enhanced game history: "Player2 (BTN) raises to $120 — Stack: $215 → $95"
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
I capture screenshot "R3_preflop_player2_raise" showing championship raise
the pot should be $180
Player4 (SB) calls $100 more with K♥Q♣ in tournament round 3
I should see enhanced game history: "Player4 (SB) calls $100 — Stack: $195 → $75"
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
the pot should be $280
Player5 (BB) goes all-in with pocket nines for $100
I should see enhanced game history: "Player5 (BB) goes all-in $100 — Stack: $100 → $0"
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
the pot should be $380
Player2 (BTN) calls remaining with pocket aces
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
Player4 (SB) calls all-in
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
I capture screenshot "R3_preflop_all_call_championship" showing all-in situation
the flop is dealt: 7♠, J♣, 4♦
I capture screenshot "R3_flop_seven_jack_four" showing championship flop
the turn is dealt: 8♥
I capture screenshot "R3_turn_eight_added" showing championship turn
the river is dealt: J♥
I capture screenshot "R3_river_jack_pairs_board" showing championship river
the championship showdown begins
Player2 should win with "two pair, aces and jacks" in tournament
I should see winner popup for "Player2"
winner popup should disappear after 3 seconds
I should see game history entry "GH-26"
Player4 should place second with "pair of jacks"
Player5 should place third with "pair of nines"
Player2 should be declared tournament champion
I should see game history entry "GH-27"
I update tournament state: Player2 wins championship
I capture screenshot "R3_river_tournament_champion" showing victory
the tournament should be complete with final standings:
I verify tournament progression was correct:
I capture screenshot "R3_river_tournament_complete" showing final standings
Player3 should be eliminated in round 1
Player1 should be eliminated in round 2
Player2 should be tournament winner
tournament blinds progressed from $5/$10 to $10/$20 to $20/$40
exactly 3 players should remain for championship round
Player "Player2" chips should be updated to 425
Player "Player4" chips should be updated to 75
Player "Player5" chips should be updated to 0
Player "Player2" should have 425 chips in the UI
Player "Player4" should have 75 chips in the UI
Player2 final stack should be greater than $400
I capture final screenshot "tournament_complete_evidence"
I should see exactly 28 game history entries
all browser instances should be closed

name: 5-Player 3-Round Tournament with Comprehensive Coverage
